name: Elitepayme PG for WooCommerce
author: Elitepayme

sections.description:
This plugin is used to integrate Elitepayme payment gateway with Woocommerce.

Pay Your Order with Elitepayme PG is the simplest of the available ways to do payment integration to your website.

The person who clicks the Pay via Elitepayme PG button will be taken to Pay with Elitepayme PG website where user will complete the transaction via Elitepayme PG and Pay with Elitepayme PG returns back the browser handle to the website after payment confirmation. Website will also receive a notification, which will be a server-to-server call as soon as the payment is done.1. Install Plugin
2. Activate and Manage
3. Setup Plugin
4. Checkout with Elitepayme PG
5. Order Received
sections.installation:
Installation

Login your WordPress admin and navigate to Plugins->Add New

Find the WooCommerce Elitepayme PG Pay plugin and activate the module.

After the successful activation of module, Visit the WooCommerce => settings page, and click on the Checkout tab.

Click On Checkout and display “Elitepayme” payment gateway.

Enable the Payment Method, and Set all details and Click Save.(See screenshot)

Now you can see *Process to Elitepayme PG * payment option on checkout page.

For Create Merchant ID Go to Elitepayme PG Merchant Dashboard.

  • Signup/Sign In on https://elitepayme.com and fill in the profile details and bank details.
sections.faq:
Whom to contact in case of any queries or any technical support ?

Please email to pg.supportand we will try to answer your queries in shortest time possible.
